forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 10 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 6 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun casts its golden rays over Downtown San Francisco this afternoon, the city embraces a soft warmth amidst a backdrop of azure skies. The air, freshly invigorated by a gentle westerly breeze, dances lightly against the skin while the temperature hovers at a comfortable level, brushing against the mid-sixties. While there are hints of clouds gathering in the distance, they primarily linger to the southwest, suggesting the possibility of a more subdued evening, perfect for a leisurely stroll through the neighborhood.

Tonight, a calm half-light will settle in, with the coolness of night creeping in gently. As the temperature dips towards the fifty-sevens, the atmosphere will take on a cozy embrace, perfect for a light sweater or a denim jacket. If you’re feeling inspired, an evening walk along the Embarcadero promises breathtaking views of the Bay Bridge, perhaps topped off with a visit to a charming café for a little respite as twilight deepens. For those who prefer indoor pursuits, the surrounding galleries beckon with their artistic allure, inviting contemplation in the quiet of early evening. This afternoon, though, you could slip into a comfortable spot and enjoy the sunlit city, feeling the rhythmic pulse of urban life all around you.
